attributes.action: Close Special needs schools in 2021 through coronavirus pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
Close special need schools not just mainstream
Leave open just for key worker children
attributes.background:
Treat all children the same and Close special need schools and open the schools for key worker children only.
This pandemic in tier 4 areas is rising.
Close all schools until further notice.
There health is more important and they can learn from home,  Teachers are risking there lives!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government's latest guidance includes Special Schools to be treated in the same way as other schools. You can find out more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/952377/Guidance_for_special_schools__specialist_post-16_providers_and_alternative_provision_during_the_national_lockdown.pdf
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
